attributes.additional_details:
A privately owned Channel 4 risks putting profit over public service.

BBC News - Channel 4 executives warn of privatisation risks - https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-57567168


https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-60985496.amp

BBC News - Channel 4 future: Government considers privatisation as consultation opens - 
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-57741988

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-54733272
attributes.background: The government claims that public ownership of Channel 4 is holding it back and hence wants to privatise it. Yet Channel 4 isn't costing the tax payer a penny, produces world class and award winning content and selling it off presents a real risk to its programming. The public doesn't want this!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
